name: cooking_startCourse
description: This function is used to start a specific cooking course on a cooking appliance.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to be controlled.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to start the cooking course.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature to be used.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The temperature to start the cooking course.

parameters.name: timer
parameters.description: The duration of the cooking course.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to start the cooking course on.
